TopicTitle: Possibility of having old Aero (<= 0.90) back as a settings option ?

Articles.Content:
Just what the title is saying...

Most of the time I have no problems with the new Aero, I only had troubles last night and only for 3 launches... But it made me think about this suggestion.

Before I would install FAR, or not, depending what type of Game I was feeling playing.

Now I don't think it's possible to install the old aero as a mod.

So having the choice when firing up a new game would be nice. In no case is this a priority thing, but it would be a "nice to have". ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Discuss...
